blogPost.title: Talent Acquisition Trends That'll Define 2022
blogPost.content:
2021 ended on a good note as far as the talent acquisition tide was concerned. It's now time to look at the top 5 trends that are poised to pave the way for 2022. 

1. Data-driven recruiting will continue to grow in 2022 too! Data will be king and will define the way recruitment technologies are used. It will control how organisations hire the best candidate at the lowest possible time.

2. Tools that'll save sourcing to shortlisting time will be the call of the day.  AI-based recruitment tools will improve and grow to match the right candidate with the right job. 

3. HR will be open to changing its policies where it will allow its gig/ contractual workers flexibility not only in terms of work times, but also flexibility in terms of roles, or from seamlessly moving to do work with two or three organisations parallel in the same day,  


4. Additionally, the Gig workforce will become pre-dominant across organisations. HR will recognise gig workers as an essential part of the workforce, bringing a much healthier mix of full-time, part-time contracts strung together, forming the core organisation. 

5. Geographical barriers will be mitigated, and organisations will adopt a more flexible work arrangement for their employees and themselves. Time and work will be flexible, enabling organisations to downsize and highlight people from remote tier 2-3 locations.
